title: Guest Episode: Marketplace Roundtable Podcast With From Growth To Value On Growth Investing
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
Happy Martin Luther King Jr. Day! We're running the latest episode from our Marketplace Roundtable podcast, featuring From Growth To Value on growth investing, in case you'd like to get some market ideas on your holiday.

Topics Covered

2:45 minute mark - What's your investing strategy?

10:30 - What's your process for narrowing down the choices?

13:00 - Background as an investor and how you started doing this.

15:00 - Anything learned over the past year?

18:15 - What is something that concerns you about the markets?

20:45 - What are you most excited about right now?

26:00 - Other companies besides SHOP that are "unscaling".

28:15 - Favorite ideas.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
